# Introduction

`CytoMethIC` package provides associated model data and functions for cancer
classification.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(CytoMethIC)
```

# Data from ExperimentHub

```{r result="asis", echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
kable(cmi_models[, c("ModelID", "PredictionLabelDescription")],
  caption = "AskMe supported models"
)
```

# Cancer type classification

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tibble)
library(sesameData)
library(ExperimentHub)
betas <- sesameDataGet("HM450.1.TCGA.PAAD")$betas
eh <- ExperimentHub()
model <- eh[["EH8395"]]
cmi_classify(betas, model)
```

```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
